attributes.action: ALL Labour Party members should be allowed a vote in the leadership contest.
attributes.additional_details: Details of your Labour membership can be found online at labour.org.uk
attributes.background:
If you joined the Labour Party after February you will not be allowed to vote in the Labour leadership contest. This is despite the membership details stating if you join "you'll be eligible to vote in leadership elections". 

The new fee to rejoin is £25. The original fee was £3.

rejection.details: Procedures for electing the leader of a political party are a matter for the party concerned, not the Government or Parliament.
